note:
Born sometime in the last century, Yvonne embodies typical Mountain beginnings – log cabin, midwife, and all. 
Mountain stories and their origins hold a deep fascination for her. Started her writing career with Interstate 40 Country Music Magazine, Yvonne has been published not only in her own country but is also widely read in Great Britain and Scandinavia as well. Yvonne currently writes as Olive at  http://olivesplace.com/  Her co-writer Tilly who is so British poke fun at history -food
